level-2.$description:
The secondary surface of application (Lower contrast to make the higher level outstanding), it’s often group other UI elements  

Container background:
→ Page that contains many card inside (Optional & depends on context of use) 
→ Card/Dialog(Modal) Body that contains many sub-cards inside it

level-3.$description:
Navigation elements (Header, Navigation, Sidebar), and other elements background such as:

Container background: 
→ Top navigation
→ Sidebar
→ Button Outline
→ Chip Unselected
→ Card Header, Body, Footer
→ Dropdown container

level-4.$description: The black blurry overlay that contains these elements/components above such as Dialog (Modal)

level-5.$description:
The highest surface of application (Overlay on the modal) of Floating elements such as Tooltip, Popover

Container background:  → Tooltip

input.$description: Background container for input field in Rest, Hover, Focused, and Pressed state

input-disabled.$description: Background container for input field in Disabled, Read-only state

rest.$description:
Background (bg) Neutral – Rest

Container background: 
→ Avatar Initials generic icon, and text
→ Date picker Item (Default, Past & Future) – Hover
→ Dropdown Item – Hover
→ Pagination Item – Hover
→ Sidebar Item – Hover
→ Tab Item – Hover

hover.$description:
Background (bg) Neutral – Hover

→ Avatar Initials (Generic icon, Overflow)
→ Date picker Item (Default, Past & Future) – Hover
→ Dropdown Item – Pressed
→ Pagination Item – Pressed
→ Sidebar Item – Pressed
→ Tab Item – Pressed

container.$description: Background container for Segment Control component

item.$description: Background container for Item Segment Control component — Rest

item-hover.$description: Background container for Item Segment Control component — Hover

item-disabled.$description: Background container for Item Segment Control component — Disabled

item-selected.$description: Background container for Item Segment Control component — Selected -Rest

item-selected-disabled.$description: Background container for Item Segment Control component — Selected -Disabled

dialog.$description: Background container for Dialog/Modal components: Dialog/Modal Header, Dialog/Modal Body, Dialog/Modal Footer

card.$description: Background container for Card components: Card Header, Card Body, Card Footer, and Accordion

main.$description:
Use for primary text/icon, such as body copy, sentence case headers, and buttons.

Foreground (fg):
→ Button Neutral, Ghost Neutral, and Outline
→ Card/Dialog/Accordion title
→ Checkbox, Radio, Switch label
→ Chip (Unselected)
→ List Label
→ Popover title, body text
→ Tooltip body text
→ Table body cell
→ Date picker item text (Today) - Rest/Hover
→ Input fields value text - Filled/Filled Error/Read-only
→ Segment control text/icon - Hover
→ Toast title, body
→ Dropdown text/icon Unselected - Rest/Hover/Pressed
→ Pagination text/icon Unselected - Rest/Hover/Pressed
→ Sidebar text/icon Unselected - Rest/Hover/Pressed

main-static.$description:
Use for primary text/icon, such as body copy, sentence case headers, and buttons but static in both Light/Dark modes.\

Foreground (fg)

subtle.$description:
Use for secondary text/icon, such as navigation, subtle button links, input field labels, all caps subheadings, and Inactive state.

Foreground (fg):
→ Alert Neutral title, body, and icon/close-icon
→ Avatar Initials Overflow, and Generic icon
→ Badge Neutral, and Outline un-emphasize
→ Breadcrumb text/icon (current) → List Description
→ Tab text/icon Unselected - Rest/Hover/Pressed
→ Table header text/icon
→ Date picker Week date label text (Today) - Rest/Hover
→ Input label
→ Input help text (Validation inline message)
→ Input character counter
→ Segment control text/icon - Activated
→ Toast icon/close-icon

subtlest.$description:
Use for tertiary text/icon, such as meta-data, breadcrumbs, input field placeholder and helper text.

Foreground (fg):
→ Input fields value text - Placeholder

disabled.$description:
Use for text/icon in a disabled, or unavailable state

Foreground (fg):
→ Button Neutral, Ghost Neutral, and Outline - Disabled
→ Checkbox, Radio, Switch label - Disabled
→ Chip (Unselected) - Disabled
→ Date - Disabled
→ Date picker item text (Past & Future) - Rest/Hover
→ Input fields value text - Disabled
→ Segment control text/icon - Disabled
→ Dropdown text/icon - Disabled
→ Pagination text/icon Unselected - Disabled
→ Sidebar text/icon Unselected - Disabled
→ Tab text/icon Unselected - Disabled

decoration.$description:
Use for decorating the UI elements as the background such as: Icon

Foreground (fg)

inverse.$description:
Use for text/icon on bold backgrounds.

Foreground (fg):
→ Alert emphasize for all types of title, body, and icon/close-icon
→ Badge emphasize for all types
→ Button Primary, Warning, and Danger

inverse-static.$description:
Use for text/icon on bold backgrounds but static in both Light/Dark modes.

Foreground (fg)

neutral-strongest.$description: Border uses in the Neutral BG

neutral-dark.$description: Text: Title, Heading, Body, Emphasize. Icon: Action
